item.title: PiHole and DNS over WireGuard
item.description: This is part of my series on renovating my homelabs to ring in the roaring ‘20s. I previously wrote about setting up a WireGuard VPN that allows me to connect to my LAN while offsite. Today I'll be setting up a PiHole and explaining how I can use this to block ads for any device on my network or connected to my VPN. Sections: Containerized PiHole Using the PiHole for DNS On the LAN Over WireGuard Setting up the PiHole I'm going to run my PiHole as a containerized process, using the official Docker image.
